q_en: For orders submitted by PolyU in January 2024, set all sewing tasks for producing Red, M size type T-shirts to start status.

steps.sql: UPDATE sewing_tasks st JOIN working_group wg ON st.working_group_id = wg.id JOIN order_product op ON st.order_product_id = op.id JOIN orders o ON op.order_id = o.id JOIN customers c ON o.user_id = c.id JOIN products p ON op.product_id = p.id JOIN products_types pt ON p.products_type_id = pt.id SET st.status = 0 WHERE c.customer_name = 'PolyU' AND wg.name = 'Skilled Sewers' AND pt.description = 'Red, M size' AND MONTH(o.created_at) = 1 AND YEAR(o.created_at) = 2024 AND pt.description = 'T-shirt';
steps.description: To set all 'Skilled Sewers' working groups for producing 'Red, M size' T-shirts ordered by customers from PolyU in January 2024 to start status, we need to update the status in the sewing_tasks table based on the specified conditions.
